name: Beacon Specialized Living New Jersey, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Beacon Specialized Living New Jersey, Inc. is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Princeton, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $32.5M in Medicaid payments across 81K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $32.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
